root.name: The King of Fighters 2006
root.description: StoryRumored that the fighting tournament in Southtown was sponsored by "Mephistopheles", a gangland syndicate, to annihilate their rivals and secure operating capital. After Duke suffered defeat at the hands of Alba Meira in the finals, he and the organization vanished completely. The media, firmly under the control of Duke, released a sensational expose. Even after all of this new information, it was still unknown that Mephistopeles was meerly a puppet to a larger plan.No one really had any idea what the Addes organization entailed, except those in the dark recesses of the underworld. White envelopes containing invitations were sent to the worlds best fighters. These fighters would find the invitation to Addes tournament irresistable.
